articles.author: Christopher Replogle
articles.title: Journey to rock Great Southern Bank Arena - KY3
articles.description: Tickets go on sale this Friday
articles.content:
SPRINGFIELD, Mo. (KY3) - Journeys Freedom Tour 2023 is coming to Springfield.
Journey and special guests Toto will perform at Great Southern Bank Arena on April 7th, 2023.
Tickets go on sale Friday… [+274 chars]
